mapper.insert: insert into member (member_id, member_name, member_sex, school_name, department_name, member_qq, member_wechat, member_phone, member_identify, member_th) values (#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberQq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberWechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberIdentify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberTh,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update member set member_name = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_sex = #{memberSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school_name = #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_name = #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_qq = #{memberQq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_wechat = #{memberWechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_phone = #{memberPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_identify = #{memberIdentify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_th = #{memberTh,jdbcType=INTEGER} where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select member_id, member_name, member_sex, school_name, department_name, member_qq, member_wechat, member_phone, member_identify, member_th from member where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select member_id, member_name, member_sex, school_name, department_name, member_qq, member_wechat, member_phone, member_identify, member_th from member
